newsitem.title: FRANCE: PRESS DIGEST - France - Le Monde Oct 21.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - France - Le Monde Oct 21.

text.p: These are leading stories in afternoon daily Le Monde.
-- President Jacques Chirac visits Israel. Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu refuses European co-monitoring of jeopardised U.S.-brokered peace process between Israel and Palestinians.

-- Some French businessmen may express interest in Thomson subsidiary Thomson Multimedia, challenging plans by Daewoo Electronics to buy TMM as part of Lagardere bid for Thomson, but government officials say they doubt offers can be submitted this late.
-- Lorraine officials criticise JVC plan to relocate in Scotland.
-- CIC bank chairman's public comments on negative effects of privatisation may lead to his dismissal.
